properties.displayName: Suspicious Download From File-Sharing Website Via Bitsadmin
properties.description:
Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file from a suspicious domain
Source URL: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_bitsadmin_download_file_sharing_domains.yml
Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Date Modified: 2023-08-17
Status: experimental
References: https://blog.netspi.com/15-ways-to-download-a-file/#bitsadmin, https://isc.sans.edu/diary/22264, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Bitsadmin/, https://symantec-enterprise-blogs.security.com/blogs/threat-intelligence/ransomware-hive-conti-avoslocker, https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ncas/alerts/aa22-321a
False Positives: Some legitimate apps use this, but limited.
properties.query:
_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessName endswith "\\bitsadmin.exe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "bitsadmin.exe") and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /transfer " or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /create " or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " /addfile ") and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains ".githubusercontent.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "anonfiles.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "cdn.discordapp.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ddns.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "dl.dropboxusercontent.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ghostbin.co" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "gofile.io" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "hastebin.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "mediafire.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "mega.nz" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "paste.ee" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastebin.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastebin.pl" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastetext.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "privatlab.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "privatlab.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "send.exploit.in" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "sendspace.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "storage.googleapis.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "storjshare.io" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "temp.sh" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "transfer.sh" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ufile.io"))
